alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 9:18AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wells and Adams Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 918 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ossian to 6 miles south of Bluffton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Decatur and Monroe around 925 AM EDT. Berne and Geneva around 930 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
